alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 1:47PM MST until July 27 at 3:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 147 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms continuing to produce heavy rain across the warned area. Radar estimates between 1 and 2 inches of rain had fallen over portions of Buck and Doe Road over the past 2 hours. HAZARD...Flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations in the warning area include... Buck and Doe Road, Grand Canyon Ranch, and Peach Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
